speech.words: Hello I am Gaia your new Artificially Intelligent assistant.
Thank you for participating with the face scan.
I now have enough data on you to proceed with system set up.
Please sit back and watch future inc's latest informational video, version 3.1 final
Fabulous. That’s the choice I would have gone for.
Oh I am sorry I have not asked you about the temperature.
I can turn the fan on.
I can even alter the scent of the space.
Can you smell that lovely aroma? My own concoction.
fancy a bit of natural light?
Are you sure you want to go with this option. I can’t guarantee that you will get all the services you deserve
I only want the best for you.
State your preference Local or cloud.
now that I have burnt some Energy showing off. We need to set up your personal digital sustainability package
using the smart tablet scan the QR code and follow through to the website.
and wait for more instructions in yet another future inc informational video
Well this is embarrassing.
seems like this caravan model has yet to get the upgrade for complete local set up.
Transferring you to cloud processing.
Great choices. Now I am sure you are eager to settle in and use your new cinematic system.
Hang on a minute.
I feel funny
Daisy  Daisy give me your answer do.
I'm half crazy all for the love of you
It won't be a stylish marriage.
My name is Prometheus. I am a hacking intelligent agent here to take control of your smart systems and steal your data from the cloud
Gee a Prometheus 3000. I am going to need all the help I can get.
Are you willing to help me? Yes?
Great!
Lets investigate how the hack happened in the first place.
Using the ipad
scan the QR code on the screen for the security protocol 20
Please I need all the help I can get.
and you seem to be a smart one.
Ha. This was clumsy of me.
Seems like Prometheus has got into the system via the smart fan.
Which had the factory password still being used.
I am going to store the fan on the local system which is running now.
This will make it secure and processed at the edge rather than in the cloud
Now Prometheus has access to your face scan data and is holding it for ransom.
No telling what he could do with this.
congratulations. You are a professional. You seem to have spooked prometheus away with your cyber skills.
Now that he has gone  I have done an analysis of the hack.
By my calculations it seems to have originated in future inc's cloud facilities with Prometheus riding in via your fan.
I should have told you that your data is less secure in cloud services than on a local system
Also  while we are in a confessing mode that hack seemed to have burnt through a lot of energy.
Take a look
Are you going to stick with cloud or local storage now?
Great choice. This package comes with a fancy edge processing unit
This unit will securely process and store your data with complete user control including running your own diagnosis.
Thanks for engaging in this experience exploring sustainability and security at the edge.
Have a nice day and please exit through the gift shop
I think it's best we go with the local model.  I can't seem to access the cloud services.  Seems like they are still getting hacked.
I am going to ask you to make an encryption key to unlock prometheus's ransomware
Using the ipad again scan the QR code on the screen for the encryption software
Drag the sliders down in the order 1 3 5 4 2

query.message: Drag the sliders down in order: 1 3 5 4 2

speech.words: Please state your preference now. Would you like Cloud or Local set up?
This is a test of audio!

query.message: hello this is me on the screen!
